name: fisuppfi
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cfn))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfn))
-| wi(w0, wss(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cfn))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfn))
-| wi(w0, wss(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), c2))

stmt.origin: fssdm(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), c2, c0, c3, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), c2))
-| wss(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cdm(c0))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cfn))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfn))
-| wss(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cdm(c0))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, c3))

|- wi(w0, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cfn))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfn))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, c3))

comment: A function on a finite set is finitely supported. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Jun-2015.)
